"I can't think of anywhere better to be when it's cold than standing over a roaring charcoal fire or a gas version thereof, that's my idea of heaven." The Better Homes and Gardens favourite and Mitsubishi Electric ambassador says the backyard barbecue is as useful a weapon in dealing with dinner during the cooler months. But in order to get the best out of your barbie in winter, the chef warns that the cooler temperatures need to be factored into your preparation and cooking routine.
